TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRelationalAnnotationProvider
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IRelationalAnnotationProvider

Docs.summary: A service typically implemented by database providers that gives access to annotations used by relational EF Core components on various elements of the .

remarks.para: The service lifetime is . This means a single instance is used by many instances. The implementation must be thread-safe. This service cannot depend on services registered as .
See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information and examples.
